text: Very cosy place in Parkroyal Marina Bay hotel. It‚Äôs located on the 4th level and it‚Äôs a perfect spot for a drink or lunch/dinner. We had salmon and beef cubes, which were perfectly cooked and very delicious. Service is very attentive and friendly. Kudos to Richard for a great hospitality and making us feel very welcomed! üòÅ

We had one lunch and one dinner seating at this place and both times it was a great experience. Wonderful service and nice ambience. You can even hear the birds chirping in the background. There is a diverse range of cuisine to choose from as well. I also found the resident robot who was helping delivering food quite cute.

Celebrated a close friend‚Äôs birthday and the experience was perfect. Maeve attended to us and she was very sweet and attentive, the birthday surprise with cake was awesome! The high tea set also came with additional sweets on a separate tray ‚Äì and Maeve ensured that we could try a bit of everything! The quality of the savoury and sweet treats was also excellent. It‚Äôs my second time here for afternoon tea and I‚Äôm definitely coming back.
Great looking venue. Drinks and food are excellent. Music can be slightly loud if you looking to have work chats.

Had a great time chillax here after lunch. Ordered some drinks and chicken wings as snacks. Kids love their wings so much that we ordered a second order. Menu has typical hotel cafe offerings. Saw a few couples enjoying their high tea too.
Lovely deco and vibe, perfect for afternoon getaway from the intense noon heat.
